ExportExcel.name: logic.business.it.YearTeamReport
ExportExcel.label: 工作日志-年报(多人统计)
ExportExcel.Sql: SELECT PERSON_ID, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Dispose_User_Label('${DISPOSE_CD}',PERSON_ID) PERSON_NAME, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}',QUERY_DATE||'-1-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-1-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) YI_NUM , BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-2-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-2-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ER_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-3-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-3-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) SAN_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-4-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-4-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) SI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-5-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-5-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) WU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-6-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-6-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) LIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-7-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-7-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) QI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-8-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-8-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) BA_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-9-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-9-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) JIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-10-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-10-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) SHI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-11-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-11-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) SHIYI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-12-1', TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(CP_DATE.Parse(QUERY_DATE||'-12-1')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) SHIER_NUM FROM (SELECT A.DISPOSE_ID PERSON_ID, TO_CHAR(CP_DATE.Parse('${QUERY_DATE}'),'YYYY') QUERY_DATE FROM (SELECT BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_New_Dispose_Id(DISPOSE_ID,DISPOSE_CD) DISPOSE_ID, DISPOSE_CD,IS_VALID FROM BS_IT_LOG) A WHERE A.DISPOSE_CD = '${DISPOSE_CD}' AND A.IS_VALID='Y' GROUP BY A.DISPOSE_ID)
